vsParam: Bill Berry

The monsters came down from the hill?

Bill Berry

Humph... I don't know why, but it seems
they're frightened by something.
Bill Berry

Those that came downhill are some timid monsters.

Yeah... Not all of them are aggressive,
but we have to kill them anyway.

if things go out of hand.
